Articles.Content:
Anyone else getting the Server Migration message when trying to download from the KSP store?

Any news from Squad on how long this migration is scheduled to take?

The migration is long done, though you might need to flush your DNS cache. On windows, press Win-R, then "cmd" enter, then "ipconfig /flushdns". On other operating systems I'm not sure how it is done.

Thanks Red,

Tried again and it worked.

My friend is getting this same issue, he has the ksp store version and im trying to help him update the game. it has been multiple hours since the message went up, im getting it on the windows 1.05 file download from his account. I need the full zip file as we uninstalled the entire game (saved his save file). Does server migration really take this long? I can download the 1.05 MAC version, and the windows installer, but the full 1.05 for windows wont download and has been on server migration for a long time.

I followed Reds advice and flushed the DNS Cache, but to no avail. Can anyone enlighten me on how to get this downloaded please?
